metadata.Title: CVE-2023-27586 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.Description: CairoSVG is an SVG converter based on Cairo, a 2D graphics library. Priorto version 2.7.0, Cairo can send requests to external hosts when processingSVG files. A malicious actor could send a specially crafted SVG file thatallows them to perform a server-side request forgery or denial of service.Version 2.7.0 disables CairoSVG's ability to access other files online bydefault.

criterions.comment: cairosvg package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
